display_long_description:
Turn your home into an epic battlefield with Boom Bots! Get ready for an unparalleled gaming experience as you don the Meta Quest and battle invading robots right in your living room, bedroom, or wherever you choose to play! Use every corner of your environment to set traps, evade attacks and turn your home into a fortress.

Destroy waves of enemies, unlock increasingly powerful weapons and take the battle to the next level! Every weapon can turn the tide of battle: with a wide range of options at your disposal, every shot brings you closer to conquering the battlefield.

Climb the global leaderboards, challenge your friends and rise to the top! Thrilling challenges and unlockable objectives will make every match a unique adventure and push you to be the best you can be. A vast arsenal of weapons allows you to create your ideal strategy and adapt your play style to each battle.

Enter the fray, claim victory and turn your world into the most exciting battlefield ever. Are you ready for action?
